attributes.review: it took way too long (almost a full millennia) and when it finally opened it unleashed a curse upon my bloodline for the next 4-6 generations. also you must READ THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS!!!! i accidentally signed away my firstborn son and my soul because i didn’t pay attention. this app is terrible. at one point it stalked me to my house, robbed me at gunpoint, and stole all of my bread, cheese, milk, and gold. i am horrified and advise no one else to get this app.
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!

attributes.review: this is literally the worst app ever. once it downloaded which took almost a week, half of my pictures were erased from my phone. after having the app open for a few seconds my phone started burning my hand plus it never does that. and it made my phone take pictures at random times. once i deleted it my phone went back to normal thank god.
attributes.title: I JUST CANT

attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. it took WEEKS for this app to download & when it finally did it filled up my storage on my phone which had over 100GB left. my phone started glitching like crazy, i received a TON of spam calls and text messages from tr*mp which makes no sense bc he’s married!! how could he text me when he’s married!! shame on him!! pls get this child out of office, he is unqualified & a disturbing & disrespectful person!
attributes.title: ⚠️❗️WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: First I open the app to see a orange, wrinkled blob on my screen and it made my grandma cry.  And then I go to the next screen to see the blob but this time it had a wig on that did no go to tint with its cheese like color. All I have to say is that this app has scarred me for life with this hideous blob thing and it’s freaking me out. But beside the point it is horrible and a waste of time where you could have spent walking your pet Caterpillar. Ciao😘

This is the WROST app I could possibly have EVER tried to get. First of all this man is a clown lmaooo☠️he’s the dumbest person I’ve ever seen, at this point it’s scary. The app glitches and it’s very slow like when I open it lags and immediately takes me out of the app. This app need to be taken down it doesn’t even work. This man is a disgrace to America and honestly needs help and that goes to anyone who supports him too.
attributes.title: AWFUL.😐

attributes.review:
yo this app actually dropped my phone in the toilet! A huge no no for me! 

maybe trump will help me get it out of the poopy and pee it’s stuck in! he obviously has no higenic standards if he is willing to reopen in person elementary schools and force teachers, Heath aids, and facilities to risk their life's to educate a asymptomatic demographic in class instead of online. well yes. 
It’s a larger issue but for now could u please pull my phone out of my poopy?
attributes.title: phone covered in poopy

attributes.review: Trump I hope you know that no one likes you but white people you are a danger to this world you don’t deserve to live you need be voted out cause honestly the day you become president again is the day we all die cause of your foolishness your whole life is a joke and I think your already know that, what your doing is way different from Obamas hard work, you need to be voted out ASAP period.
attributes.title: I don’t like you

attributes.review: this app took FOREVER to download, and when i say forever i mean forever, literally 3 days even though my data is extremely fast and everything else downloads in seconds to minutes. after it finally downloaded it asked for so much of my very personal information which i find highly inappropriate, and then a few days after that ALL MY STUFF GOT HACKED!! please do not download
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: App crashed several times and hacked all my private information!!!! this app is very glitchy, and not well though out and put together. My phone kept restarting and the app drained all of my battery life. The app wouldn’t close most of the time I used it and lagged everytime i tried to tap the screen. I wouldn’t recommend this app to support our lord and savior trump😡✨🦋💗🌴🧚🧚🌈
attributes.title: Would not recommend 😖😡
